OpenSim.Services.Interfaces.ICapsService Interface Reference

This controls what regions and users have Caps SEED requests and all of the Cap handlers associated with those requests. More...

string HostUri [get]

 The registry where all the interfaces are pulled from.
IHttpServer Server [get]
 The HTTP server that all CAP handlers will be added to.

Detailed Description

This controls what regions and users have Caps SEED requests and all of the Cap handlers associated with those requests.

Member Function Documentation

void OpenSim.Services.Interfaces.ICapsService.AddCapsForRegion ( ulong  RegionHandle  ) 

Create a caps handler for the given region.

Parameters:
RegionHandle 
string OpenSim.Services.Interfaces.ICapsService.CreateCAPS ( UUID  AgentID,
string  CAPSBase,
ulong  regionHandle,
bool  IsRootAgent,
AgentCircuitData  circuitData 
)

Create the CAPS handler for the given user at the region given by the regionHandle.

Parameters:
AgentID The agents UUID
CAPSBase The CAPS request, looks like '/CAPS/(UUID)0000/
regionHandle The region handle of the region the user is being added to
IsRootAgent Whether this new Caps agent is a root agent in the sim
circuitData The circuit data of the agent that is being created

/param>

Returns:
Returns the CAPS URL that was created by the CAPS Service
string OpenSim.Services.Interfaces.ICapsService.CreateCAPS ( UUID  AgentID,
string  CAPSBase,
ulong  regionHandle,
bool  IsRootAgent,
AgentCircuitData  circuitData,
uint  port 
)

Create the CAPS handler for the given user at the region given by the regionHandle.

Parameters:
AgentID The agents UUID
CAPSBase The CAPS request, looks like '/CAPS/(UUID)0000/
regionHandle The region handle of the region the user is being added to
IsRootAgent Whether this new Caps agent is a root agent in the sim
circuitData The circuit data of the agent that is being created
port The port to use for the CAPS service
Returns:
Returns the CAPS URL that was created by the CAPS Service
